name: VsTest
help: VSTest.Console.exe is the command-line command that is used to run tests. You can specify several options in any order on the VSTest.Console.exe command line.

properties.name: TestAssemblies
properties.help: Run tests from the specified files. Separate multiple test file names with spaces.

properties.name: SettingsFile
properties.help: Run tests with additional settings such as data collectors.

properties.name: Tests
properties.help: Run tests with names that match the provided values. To provide multiple values, separate them by commas.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help: Specifies that the tests be executed in parallel. By default up to all available cores on the machine may be used. The number of cores to use can be configured by using a settings file.

properties.name: EnableCodeCoverage
properties.help: Enables data diagnostic adapter CodeCoverage in the test run.

properties.name: InIsolation
properties.help: Runs the tests in an isolated process.

properties.name: UseVsixExtensions
properties.help: This makes vstest.console.exe process use or skip the VSIX extensions installed (if any) in the test run.

properties.name: TestAdapterPath
properties.help: Forces the vstest.console.exe process to use custom test adapters from a specified path (if any) in the test run.

properties.name: Platform
properties.help: Target platform architecture to be used for test execution.

properties.name: Framework
properties.help: Target .NET Framework version to be used for test execution.

properties.name: TestCaseFilters
properties.help: Run tests that match the given expression.<Expression> is of the format <property>=<value>[|<Expression>].The /TestCaseFilter command line option cannot be used with the /Tests command line option.For information about creating and using expressions, see TestCase filter.

properties.name: Logger
properties.help: Specify a logger for test results. Example: To log results into a Visual Studio Test Results File (TRX) use <c>/Logger:trx</c>.

properties.name: ListTests
properties.help: Lists discovered tests from the given test container.

properties.name: DiagnosticsFile
properties.help: Writes diagnostic trace logs to the specified file.
